appDescription.origMessage: A Fast and simple document scanner app with high quality text output.
appDescription.currentMessage: A Fast and simple document scanner app with high quality text output.

subHeadOne.origMessage: Scan Image from your folder or Internet.
subHeadOne.currentMessage: Scan Image from your folder or Internet.

subHeadOneDesc.origMessage: Do Image scan on any webpage [using our browser extenion] on the internet or uplaod your image on our website to get text using our best accuracy OCR technology.
subHeadOneDesc.currentMessage: Do Image scan on any webpage [using our browser extension] on the internet or upload your image on our website to get text using our best accuracy OCR technology.

subHeadTwoDesc.origMessage: Supports 100+ language and its variants. Scan document of any language and get Text using our Image to Text (OCR) app.
subHeadTwoDesc.currentMessage: Supports 100+ language and its variants. Scan document of any language and get Text using our Image to Text (OCR) app.

headF1Desc.origMessage: Click on the option "upload pdf to do OCR" from context menu to do Document scan on Pdfs and get Text.
headF1Desc.currentMessage: Click on the option "upload pdf to do OCR" from context menu to do Document scan on Pdfs and get Text.

headF2Desc.origMessage: Click on the extension icon from Screen cropper will appear. then Click on the + button, cropped screen will be scanned and you will get the Text.
headF2Desc.currentMessage: Click on the extension icon from Screen cropper will appear. then Click on the + button, cropped screen will be scanned and you will get the Text.

headF3Desc.origMessage: Play the the OCR Text using our Text to Speech Technology. Translate OCR Text in any language you want.
headF3Desc.currentMessage: Play the the OCR Text using our Text to Speech Technology. Translate OCR Text in any language you want.
